name: Application and license fees
text:
§489D-10  Application and license fees.  (a)  Each application shall be accompanied by:
     (1)  A nonrefundable application fee in the amount of $5,000; and
     (2)  An initial annual license fee of $5,000.
     (b)  The license fee shall be refunded if the application is denied. [L 2006, c 153, pt of §1; am L 2008, c 195, §6; am L 2013, c 167, §6]
